00028 Text::Text (const std::string content)
00029     :   content_(content),
00030         wordRates_(std::map<std::string, unsigned int>())
00031 {
00032     // Buld the appearance rate of every word in text
00033     computeWordRates();

00041 unsigned int Text::words () const
00042 {
00043     unsigned int nWords = 0;
00044     
00045     for ( std::map<std::string, unsigned int>::const_iterator it = wordRates_.begin(); it not_eq wordRates_.end(); ++it )
00046         nWords += (*it).second;
00047     
00048     return nWords;
00049 };

00058 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character, const unsigned int &position)
00059 {
00060     if(position > content_.length())
00061         content_.append(1, character);
00062     else
00063     {
00064         if (position < 0)
00065             content_.insert(0, 1, character);
00066         else
00067             content_.insert(position, 1, character);
00068     }
00069     
00070     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00071     computeWordRates();
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 
00079 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character)
00080 {
00081     // Call the generic 'addCharacter' function
00082     addCharacter(character, content_.length());
00083 }

00086 
00091 void Text::removeCharacter (const unsigned int &position)
00092 {
00093     if (position > content_.length())
00094         content_.erase(content_.end());
00095     else
00096     {
00097         if ( position < 0 )
00098             content_.erase(content_.begin());
00099         else
00100             content_.erase(position, 1);
00101     }
00102     
00103     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00104     computeWordRates();
00105 };

00108 
00112 void Text::updateWordRate (const std::string &word)
00113 {
00114     // Convenience typedefs
00115     typedef std::map<std::string, unsigned int>::iterator wordRatesIterator;
00116     typedef std::pair<wordRatesIterator, wordRatesIterator> wordRatesIteratorPair;
00117     
00118     // Searches the word in the associative map
00119     wordRatesIteratorPair p = wordRates_.equal_range(word);
00120     
00121     if (p.first not_eq p.second)    // Found, just update the rate
00122         wordRates_[word]++;
00123     else
00124         wordRates_.insert(p.first, std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>(word, 1));
00125 };
00126 
00127 
00128 
00133 void Text::computeWordRates (const std::string &delimiters)
00134 {
00135     // Remove previous rates
00136     wordRates_.clear();
00137     
00138     // Set the delimiters and tokenize the content
00139     boost::char_separator<char> separators(delimiters.data());
00140     boost::tokenizer< boost::char_separator<char> > tokenizer(content_, separators);
00141     
00142     // Extract each word and update its appearance rate
00143     for(boost::tokenizer< boost::char_separator<char> >::iterator token=tokenizer.begin(); token not_eq tokenizer.end(); ++token)
00144         updateWordRate( *token );
00145 };
